Cost surveillance

cost_surveillance.Rd

Cost of epidemiological and entomological surveillance.

Usage

cost_surveillance(pop_at_risk, cost_per_pop_at_risk = 0.05)

Arguments

pop_at_risk

Population at risk

cost_per_pop_at_risk

Cost per population at risk

Value

Surveillance costs

References

cost_per_pop_at_risk

Estimate from Patouillard et al (2017), consisting of a summary from the strategic plans from: Botswana, Nigeria, India, Eritrea, Swaziland, Namibia.

https://gh.bmj.com/content/2/2/e000176.
